events.title: Signal Noise
events.text_stub: Telemetry stations report rising anomaly noise. Analysts disagree on whether it is a false alarm or the start of a pattern.
details: Sensor noise rising across multiple regions.
Quiet probes reduce panic but drain resources.
Public briefings trade trust for scrutiny.

choices.text: Fund a quiet investigation and keep it out of the media cycle.
Brief the press to build transparency and public trust.

events.title: Crisis Ripple
events.text_stub: A chain of coordinated incidents stretches response teams across multiple regions.
details: Response teams stretched thin across districts.
Deploy stabilizes risk but drains resources.

choices.text: Deploy emergency assets to stabilize the situation.
Delegate to allied factions and focus on intelligence.

events.title: Cosmic Breach
events.text_stub: A breach opens beyond the atmosphere, warping physics in the upper sky.
details: Physics distortions spreading at high altitude.
Sealing prioritizes safety but burns resources.
Study improves insight but raises exposure.

choices.text: Commit resources to sealing the breach immediately.
Stabilize the perimeter and study the breach.
